I can't get this to play on the PS3.  Plays fine using WMP 11 with Vista Codec pack on my PC running Vista 64, but PS3 sees it as an unsupported file type when I try to stream it via my wired network connection.

I've also tried putting the .mt2s file on a USB drive to connect directly to the PS3, but the PS3 doesn't recognize the file on the USB drive. 

Anybody have any ideas?  PS3 firmware is 2.80.

Thanks for the up bricktop!
Figured out how to navigate my USB drive on the PS3, and file plays great as is!  Great movie.
Why not make 720p rip if file size limitation is 4gb? Higher resolution with undersized bitrate kills detail. 720p with 5-6 mbits would look much better. Thanks anyway.
